author: Staff Reporter
text:
The Gandhiya Makkal Katchi will contest from 26 Assembly constituencies in the State, including Colachel, Nagercoil and Padmanabhapuram in Kanyakumari district, according to its founder Tamilaruvi Manian.

He told journalists here that the All India Anna Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam had taken up the release of the convicts in former Prime Minister Rajiv Gandhi assassination case only as a tool to drive a wedge between the Dravida Munnetra Kazhagam and the Congress. He felt that since the convicts were behind bars for 24 years, they should be released on humanitarian grounds.
title: GMK to contest from 3 Kumari constituencies
